![Meet 5 Copilot agents from our partners changing how work gets done](https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/v2/D5612AQEiPOCznzusVw/article-cover_image-shrink_720_1280/B56ZnaEmAPHAAI-/0/1760300263776?e=2147483647&v=beta&t=wFogtGsELbNXfbXZIw37bNUzyYGF8CNcMpj-BMIKqpI)

We've been hard at work [advancing M365 Copilot](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/satyanadella_supercharged-past-few-weeks-as-we-push-the-activity-7380319088272781312-aY4x?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop&rcm=ACoAAAEkwwAB9KEc2TrQgOLEQ-vzRyZeCDyc6DQ&trk=article-ssr-frontend-pulse_little-text-block), and so have our many partners who are building agents that integrate with Copilot and Teams to transform how work gets done.

A few great examples:

1/ ServiceNow - Autonomously execute complex, cross-functional processes.

2/Snowflake - Ask questions about your data using everyday language instead of having to write complex SQL queries or create custom dashboards.

3/ Moveworks - Streamline multi-step workflows like system access, account lookups, new hire onboarding, and more, creating a seamless experience for all your workforce.

4/ Templafy - Create docs and presentations that are always on brand and meet company guidelines!

5/ LexisNexis - Add the Protege agent to your next Teams meeting and ask legal questions and draft legal docs grounded in your past work and authoritative content from LexisNexis.

These are all live today! Just go to the Agent Store in Copilot to try them out, along with dozens of others.

Learn more ... [Introducing the Agent Store: Build, publish, and discover agents in Microsoft 365 Copilot](https://www.linkedin.com/redir/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdevblogs%2Emicrosoft%2Ecom%2Fmicrosoft365dev%2Fintroducing-the-agent-store-build-publish-and-discover-agents-in-microsoft-365-copilot%2F&urlhash=2WM8&trk=article-ssr-frontend-pulse_little-text-block)

Title: We’ve been hard at work advancing M365 Copilot, and so have our many partners who are building agents that integrate with Copilot and Teams to transform how work gets done. Check out a few great examples.
